title: The Courseware site redirects me to an error page

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I cannot log in with my Unity ID.
  • After I enter their Unity ID username/password, I am redirected to https://unity3d.com/unity-docebo-sso/error.

sections.title: Cause
content: We are currently investigating the cause of this sporadic login failure.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Clear your browser cache. If this does not work, sign in on the Unity ID page(id.unity.com) as usual, then visit https://unity3d.com/unity-docebo-sso to be redirected into the Courseware site.

sections.title: More Information
content: Note: If your Courseware was included in a Unity Plus, Pro, or Enterprise license purchase, you must assign each of your Courseware users a license seat.
If you purchased your Courseware as a standalone item, this does not apply.
